siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Neuro gives you access to a network of GPUs with a single API call. Get instant MLOps. ☁️ Serverless compute ⚖️ Only pay for the compute used = no more 24/7 hosting fees! ⚡️ Go from prototype to production +10x faster. Check it out at https://www.getneuro.ai/
blogPost.body: Neuro gives you access to a network of GPUs with a single API call. Get instant MLOps. ☁️ Serverless compute ⚖️ Only pay for the compute used = no more 24/7 hosting fees! ⚡️ Go from prototype to production +10x faster. Check it out at https://www.getneuro.ai/
blogPost.title: Neuro - Instant infrastructure for machine learning
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Neuro让您只需调用一个API就能访问GPU网络。获得即时的MLOps。⚖️ 无服务器计算 ⚖️ 只需为所使用的计算付费=不再需要24/7的托管费! ⚡️从原型到生产+10倍的速度。查看https://www.getneuro.ai/
localize.tagline: 机器学习的即时基础设施

localize.description: Neuro讓您只需調用一個API就能訪問GPU網絡。獲得即時的MLOps。⚖️ 無服務器計算 ⚖️ 只需爲所使用的計算付費=不再需要24/7的託管費! ⚡️從原型到生產+10倍的速度。查看https://www.getneuro.ai/
localize.tagline: 機器學習的即時基礎設施

previous.excerpt: Our online eye exam makes it easy to get eye care from your couch. Visit our online eye clinic to quickly renew your glasses +/- contact lens prescriptions ($30,) or chat with a licensed eye doctor ($55)! Try here: https://www.quadranteye.com/ YC W21 Batch
previous.title: Quadrant Eye - Renew your glasses and contact lens RX from your couch

localize.description: 我们的在线眼科检查让您在沙发上就能轻松获得眼科护理。访问我们的在线眼科诊所，快速更新您的眼镜+/-隐形眼镜处方(30美元，)或与执业眼科医生聊天(55美元)! 請按這裡: https://www.quadranteye.com/ YC W21 Batch
localize.tagline: 在您的沙发上更新您的眼镜和隐形眼镜RX。

localize.description: 我們的在線眼科檢查讓您在沙發上就能輕鬆獲得眼科護理。訪問我們的在線眼科診所，快速更新您的眼鏡+/-隱形眼鏡處方(30美元，)或與執業眼科醫生聊天(55美元)! 請按這裡: https://www.quadranteye.com/ YC W21 Batch
localize.tagline: 在您的沙發上更新您的眼鏡和隱形眼鏡RX。

next.excerpt: On Deck is awesome, but it costs both time and money. Browse Fellows from across cohorts, and book a 1:1 with them for free. They'll help you figure out if the program is a fit for you and your lifestyle.
next.title: HelloFellow - Free chats with On Deck fellows

localize.description: 在甲板上很厉害，但是既要花时间又要花钱。浏览来自各队列的研究员，并与他们免费预约1:1。他们会帮助你找出这个项目是否适合你和你的生活方式。
在甲板上很厲害，但是既要花時間又要花錢。瀏覽來自各隊列的研究員，並與他們免費預約1:1。他們會幫助你找出這個項目是否適合你和你的生活方式。
